task.title: Assign an elastic IP address using euca2ools

taskbody.context: In this section of the lab you will use euca2ools to assign a reserved public IP address to a specific instance.

step.cmd: With your instance running, assign the reserved IP address to your instance.
View the public IP addresses again. Note that the IP address assigned to your instance was assigned by the user admin and not by eucalyptus.
View your running instance again. Note that the IP address assigned to your instance has changed.
